website_summaries.verdict: These stones have a different look to them, come in a set of six, and are made of food-grade material.
pros: This set of low-priced stainless steel whiskey stones come with a plastic tray for storage and a set of tongs
They also chill longer than other options because of a unique non-toxic gel center
cons: The stones are tough to grab with the included set of tongs

customer_reviews.title: No metal taste
customer_reviews.text: Great Ice Cube replacements no metal taste no water down drink when the Ice Cube's melt. In case you're wondering these aren't solid stainless steel they have liquid in the middle which probably makes them stay colder longer than a solid piece of stainless steel would I'm guessing make sense to me. And the tongs are a good idea for handling them when they're frozen have you ever seen the Christmas story with the little kid his tongue and the flagpole LOL. Once they're in your drink they're fine but right out of the freezer you want to use the tongs. The whole set-up including the plastic case they come in is all really sturdy and well-built.
customer_reviews.author: Hacksaw

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought these on Prime day because they were such a good deal. I didn't really expect them to do a lot. I live in Hawaii, ice melts pretty fast even in an insulated cup. I put these in with ice and even if I finish my beverage I can still sit in the pool or hot tub and take my time going back to the kitchen to get another. These seem to keep the ice from melting hardly at all. I haven't tried these w/o ice but it's amazing how long my ice lasts and my drink doesn't get super watery.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi_A

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product - Unless you expect a miracle
customer_reviews.text: I have a set of soap stone whiskey stones, and these are far and above a superior product. If you expect them to take a beverage from room temperature to ice cold, you will be disappointed. If you reasonably expect to keep a chilled drink chilled you will be pleased. They keep a beverage chilled a LOT longer than the soap stones. I am extremely happy with these and highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Merlin87

customer_reviews.title: Keeps drinks cold and  flavorful, however, was quite unaware of the weight of each of these cubes.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely heavy cubes which stays at the bottom of glass. The bad part is, when sipping drinks, be careful the cubes don't slide up to your mouth and chip a tooth, or crack and break your drinking glass when leveling your glass as you are drinking with these cubes. Always use the tongs to carefully lower the cubes into your glass. Don't simply drop them, as they may easily crack or break your glass. I do like that the drinks do not become weak due to the cubes not melting down into the drink, however.
customer_reviews.author: Keith S.

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: The Kollea Stainless steel cubes work really well. I use all six in a glass of iced tea. The tea is refrigerated when I put the cubes in. It keeps the tea cold for about 12 hours, then its still cool for hours later. I bought a second set. I included the brand name because i have found the ratings include all stainless steel cubes. i researched this & these were rated in the top five.
customer_reviews.author: Marie L

customer_reviews.title: Some metal in the freezer
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought these to cool whiskey. The problem with stainless steel cubes is that they're not solid stainless steel, which means it doesn't retain its cold properties. Whatever liquid substance I place these cubes in whether water, soda, or ethanol it barely changes the temperature ever so slightly and remain that slight lower temperature for only a mere minute or two. If you want something cold that will chill your drink that won't dilute your beverage with water, I suggest a similar product which is BPA free silicon or plastic cubes filled with liquid. At least these cubes transfer its cold properties a bit better than these.
customer_reviews.author: W Akiro

customer_reviews.title: Must have if you don't like muss and fuss making ice for summer drinks of any sort
customer_reviews.text: Does cool beverage quickly without diluting. Keep it in the freezer for cocktails or ice water. Reusable for long time. Easy to rinse clean the smooth stainless steel. Would make a nice gift with silicone ends on tongs that come with it nicely package.
customer_reviews.author: Jadwiga

customer_reviews.title: Just ok.
customer_reviews.text: Do not keep cold temperatures well. Within about ten minutes, the cubes are at room temp, even in drinks. Gave them as a gift to my boyfriend, who loved them, but using them was a bit disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Solfest

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for whiskey drinker.
customer_reviews.text: The presentation was great. Nice box. The cubes are a good size, could be a little bigger. The tongs in the case seem to make the product more difficult to use. They spring open. I gifted these to my boyfriend and he likes them. I am happy with the purchase and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Miller

customer_reviews.title: Chilly and Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My husband purchased these for me as a Christmas gift a few years back. Everyone gets a kick out of them at parties, I don't know why it's so fascinating but to see a glass frost up just after dropping these in is pretty cool. They've made it through a couple moves, many drops on the floor and still look and work just as well as the day he bought them. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Skedaddlin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent investment
customer_reviews.text: I really dislike when my drinks get watered down, but I also really hate warm beverages that should be cold. These steel ice cubes seriously solve that problem! I use them for cocktails or regular drinks, they're easy to clean and a decent size. Three per cup will do the trick and they stay cold for a long time. The package arrived the day it was promised to be delivered ;)
customer_reviews.author: Linda E. Rasch

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the first round of drinks
customer_reviews.text: These are a nice alternative to ice cubes so drinks don't get watered down, but don't stay cold super long, especially if your refills aren't already cold--and if you (and a buddy) tend to have at least a couple refills, you either need more than one set of these of these or inevitably end up using ice anyway. Least you look fancy for the first round!
customer_reviews.author: DBH

customer_reviews.title: Great for SMALL beverages only!
customer_reviews.text: Well made, easy to clean, and smooth to the touch! However, I was hoping these would be a great replacement for traditional ice cubes from a tray to be used in a mug or travel container. These are not. While they may be great for a whiskey glass, they come no where near performing as well as ice cubes for keeping your drink cold.
customer_reviews.author: J.Black

customer_reviews.title: Only good for cooling half can of coke
customer_reviews.text: It has nice looking but only small cooling effects, maybe only good for a half can of coke. Considering the cooling effect, I think it’s a little overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband. He loves these. Keeps his drinks super cold without watering down!
customer_reviews.author: Lys

customer_reviews.title: They are the perfect size and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my husband for Christmas. He loves them and uses them we he does not want his drink to get watered down. They are the perfect size and easy to clean. We love the holder and tongs that come with them. We keep it all in the freezer. They keep drinks colder than traditional ice as well, which is a plus. We will probably buy another set of these for ourselves and maybe even as gifts for our friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Black

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome for keeping drinks cold and not diluting them within ...
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome for keeping drinks cold and not diluting them within five minutes like normal ice cubes do. If you put them in the freezer for a few hours before you plan on having a drink or if you just keep them in there as you do regular ice cubes, your drink will be perfect. The coating on the cubes hasn't chipped off or shown any sign off wear and tear so the durability is good as well. Good product!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph N.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: When I order a soft drink I get it with no ice because by the time I finish it the ice would be watered down and diluted. Now I can still have cold soft drinks, even a couple hours later. It also keeps the Scotch a friend drinks cool.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Howlett

customer_reviews.title: It's wasting money.
customer_reviews.text: Do not work. Stay cold for just seconds. Better use old fashion ice cubes.
customer_reviews.author: Julio

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat Handy
customer_reviews.text: The concept of stainless steel ice cubes that can replace regular ice cubes has a future going for itself here. Unlike regular ice cubes, these don't water down your drink which is outstanding. Although, these don't really make your drink cold like regular ice cubes do. The package comes with 6 ice cubes and putting all 6 into a room temperature glass of water does not cool the water in the same amount of time it does for a couple regular ice cubes. Other than that major factor, the cubes came in a neat case with some ice tongs and it looks really cool.
customer_reviews.author: Lavante Ward

customer_reviews.title: Great item. I would love these if they were ...
customer_reviews.text: Great item. I would love these if they were very dense and held their temperature a lot longer, but the reviews I've seen have these at or near the top, so I guess I am just being picky! Get them, for the price, it's worth it. Remember, they are not for chilling a mixed drink and only effective in approximately 4 oz or less of fluid.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Use with a YETI cup and keep ur whiskey in the freezer
customer_reviews.text: Obviously not as good as actual ice cubes, the benefit is you don't water down your whiskey. If u want a good tip get a YETI lowball glass put it in the freezer with your whiskey and ur metal cubes. Use 3 cubes every time you get a new glass. It will be as cold as possible without watering down. Keeps ur whiskey cool for about a hour.
customer_reviews.author: oxyfiretech

customer_reviews.title: Looks
customer_reviews.text: Only use once not sure how well they work. I forget to use them
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Moore

customer_reviews.title: how am i suppose to put to freezer?
customer_reviews.text: it is not user-friendly or freezer friendly because the packaging is not for the freezer. The packaging box gets moist when put it in a freezer. you have to take all cubes out and put another box or container to restore in a freezer. i was trying so hard to a perfect container. Eventually, i put these cubes in a plastic quart. the cubes do make my drink cool.
customer_reviews.author: Hing Yan

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Love. Great for all types of drinks. Have used it for whiskey, which it's cooling abilities impressed everyone, and have used it for white wine, which for some reason didn't work as well as the hard liquor, but still works. I have bought a few sets for gifts after using it myself.
customer_reviews.author: Blank015

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my mom to use in her glass of chilled white wine. They retain the chill for a long time, are easy to clean, and have a classy look. She especially likes the box and tongs they came with. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Cold Whiskey and Scratch-Free Glasses!
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my old-fashioned's cold, strong, and stylish while keeping my good glasses scratch free!
customer_reviews.author: Jed Cangco

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: A very solid and durable product. Very easy to clean and does not dilute your drink at all! They do get quite cold like an ice cube so the tongs are quite lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure why but it doesn’t feel like it cools off my drink even if I leave it to stay in the freezer for over 6 hours. I don’t recommend it as I tried it with soda, water, vitamin water and more but none felt ‘ colder’ even if it sits with the drink for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed Alhamadah

customer_reviews.title: It's okay but doesn't always work.
customer_reviews.text: Great idea really is but didn't chill my drinks fast enough or at all. It worked well sometimes on small cups of water but you have to use too many of them to just get a slight chill.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Rivas

customer_reviews.title: Cool drink, happy husband!
customer_reviews.text: These are super cool. They are like those little plastic reusable ice cubes that kids use- but for grown ups!! They don’t water down your drink and keep it cold for a long time. These are definitely worth the price! My husband loves them.
customer_reviews.author: AmyJM333

customer_reviews.title: Decent for price
customer_reviews.text: This product is decent for the price. The cubes do not appear to stay real cold for very long
customer_reviews.author: Demond Reed

customer_reviews.title: Great price !
customer_reviews.text: Great little set! They chill bourbon to the perfect temperature ! I use two and the fit side by side in a glencairn glass.
customer_reviews.author: Tailoredsuits

customer_reviews.title: Love It !!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my Mother in a nursing home. She loved to bring her drink to bingo and it would stay nice and cold.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Perfection in a box
customer_reviews.text: Big whiskey fan, I should have bought this years ago
customer_reviews.author: Boris

customer_reviews.title: Pros outweigh Cons
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean and use but don’t stay cold for too long. I switch them out so drinks stay chilled but would like if I didn’t need have to. The positives are that they dont water down your drinks (whiskey, scotch, etc), they are easy to clean and come with cute little tongs.
customer_reviews.author: It’s Me

customer_reviews.title: Ice cubes
customer_reviews.text: They freeze well, but warm up real fast. Real ice may melt, but it keeps the drink cold.
customer_reviews.author: David L. Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Worthless!
customer_reviews.text: Could not even keep an already cold drink cold in an insulated mug.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Addict!

customer_reviews.title: Good product, does its job.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what you expect. Cubes get very cold, good for chilling any drink. Cubes are hollow, a little bit small, which is good for smaller cups or glasses, like a whiskey glass. Comes with a little tray and tongs. Can't really ask for much more.
customer_reviews.author: Griffin P.

customer_reviews.title: These are PERFECT! They freeze quickly and don't dilute your drink
customer_reviews.text: My ice maker has been broken for years and ice cube trays simply don't work out for me. These are PERFECT! They freeze quickly and don't dilute your drink. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lois

customer_reviews.title: nice  elegant
customer_reviews.text: They look very well made smooth elegant my brother is going to like them
customer_reviews.author: adam

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't keep things cold for extended time
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would keep my drink cold for awhile but it doesn't. Really bummed
customer_reviews.author: Elephant

customer_reviews.title: convenient
customer_reviews.text: nice for mixed drinks, no watering down. easy to store in freezer, doesn't take much space
customer_reviews.author: L. Best

customer_reviews.title: He loved them! I should have put the package in ...
customer_reviews.text: What a surprise for my husband. He loved them! I should have put the package in the freezer so he could use them right away. Just be warned....these don't float! Odd how one mind thinks they should. He loves that there now no cold object keeping him from his drink! :)
customer_reviews.author: Smokin'Cherry

customer_reviews.title: They're alright - they don't cool liquid as much as you'd probably like ( took ...
customer_reviews.text: They're alright - they don't cool liquid as much as you'd probably like ( took a room-temp bev and made it slightly cool ). Packaging is nice and they're easy to clean. Might work better if you shove all of them into one glass, since they're small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Colder and last longer!
customer_reviews.text: Terrific! Far better than even larger ones I’ve purchased. Colder and last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Buck

customer_reviews.title: I loved these
customer_reviews.text: Got them so I wasn't watering down my whiskey or tequila and have not been disappointed. I have since started drinking them warm like a civilized human-being so now these are just taking up space in my freezer, but that is not the products fault.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: who needs ice when you can have steel
customer_reviews.text: I got these as a gift for my aunty who doesn't like her drinks watered down. Pro -Freeze quick Con -I wish it came with more
customer_reviews.author: Doug AnjahTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Not as cool as we were hoping
customer_reviews.text: Not as cool as we were hoping... The day after purchasing, we found a similar product at Ross - it was cheaper and came with two bar glasses. They work well though. My brother in law is happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Schussman

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING - Doesn't water down your drink, and stays cold!
customer_reviews.text: These are so convenient for sipping whiskey or other drinks. Stays cold, easy to drink, totally recommend! Way better than traditional ice cubes because it doesn't water down your drink.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Dahlquist

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Gave it as a gift but my uncle seems to love it he doesn’t sue ice anymore only these cubes for his Chardonnay
customer_reviews.author: Mark Eures

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: These are great and look sleek, however they don’t become very cold even when you leave it in the freezer overnight. I recommend adding them along with normal ice cubes or refrigerated drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Keerthana Srinivasan

customer_reviews.title: Permanent Ice Cubes! Coool!
customer_reviews.text: I hate watery drinks. I don't drink alcohol but I drink a lot of iced tea and juice drinks and regular ice cubes always leave me with a few watery sips at the end. These sipping stones are really remarkable. They are the only ones I found that chill in the freezer in just an hour (the others I looked at took 4 hours!). Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Reichenbach

customer_reviews.title: but some people like the modern feel
customer_reviews.text: Water always diluted my sister's drinks so she wanted me to get her this. The look a little shiny, but some people like the modern feel!
customer_reviews.author: Josh Henderson

customer_reviews.title: It's chilling
customer_reviews.text: Love these in my wine, especially if I've just opened a bottle that's not pre-chilled. Stays cold for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: hmmmm not again
customer_reviews.text: not sure what's in these but it is some sort of liquid. washed thoroughly prior to use. became ill after using.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed hubby
customer_reviews.text: I brought these for my hubby for Christmas, he said they didn’t give his drinks much of a chill. Very disappointed as the reviews were very good.
customer_reviews.author: Maries_world

customer_reviews.title: Brothers gift from me
customer_reviews.text: Not actually sure if they are great or not i bought them for my brother for Christmas but he said they are good.
customer_reviews.author: Smudge1

customer_reviews.title: Cool item
customer_reviews.text: My brother offhandedly mentioned that he liked these while flipping through a Brookstone catalog. Of course, theirs were exorbitantly priced. I found these much cheaper and gave them to my big bro for Christmas. He was beyond thrilled!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie E. McCullough

customer_reviews.title: Not for cooling
customer_reviews.text: They don’t really make your drink cold they kind of keep it cold for a little while maybe.
customer_reviews.author: Audri

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, non-functional
customer_reviews.text: Cubes are shiny, but doesn't do a good job to chill scotch.
customer_reviews.author: Rajat

customer_reviews.title: Great gift.
customer_reviews.text: Got them for my husband as a valentines gift with one of his favorite whiskeys and glass set. He loved them but said they don't stay cold as long as he wished they did. He usually has to place 2-3 in a glass to enjoy a drink.
customer_reviews.author: Mirsa B.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Keeps my whiskey cold without watering it down. Two at a time are enough for me so I can rotate them if having more than one drink. Just rinse them off and put back in the freezer.
customer_reviews.author: David Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: it dun cold last, not for long time..use only one time
customer_reviews.author: Celine

customer_reviews.title: The cubes look nice in my whisky
customer_reviews.text: They keep my Highball cold and the cubes don't melt so they don't water down my drink.
customer_reviews.author: stephen lascola

customer_reviews.title: Expectations
customer_reviews.text: Don't expect to cool more than one drink between freezing. Don't expect them to get the temperature of the liquid below 38-40 degrees. Don't expect them to melt and water down your drink; and don't expect them to float and keep the top of a deep drink cool. But you can expect to enjoy a drink the way it was made and the way it was meant to be enjoyed. I have my evening cocktail, then rinse them off and back in the freezer they go. I love them and recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J. Meeker

customer_reviews.title: Great man gift
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my husband for Christmas. He barely uses them but they look nice l.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Cogswell

customer_reviews.title: Stainless Steel Cubes
customer_reviews.text: Best idea ever. You can chill anything without ice melting in your drink. I order them for everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: cools your drinks without melted ice in your drink. works fantastically! I never will use ice again. Fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Just nice
customer_reviews.text: I like them much and they are better than the stone ones. 2 of them is enough to chill down multiple shots.
customer_reviews.author: Murat

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, elegant, practical cubes that keep my drink nice and cool.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these ice cubes. They keep my drink very cold, and they look nice. They are good quality too, and they seem to hold up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These “ice cubes” are great. Wish I had these years ago for iced coffee.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Gave this as a gift to relatives who love their wine and beer undiluted
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift to relatives who love their wine and beer undiluted. They like using them and say they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy Dee

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as depicted
customer_reviews.text: These cubes are great for chilling drinks - particularly bourbon - without watering them down. They chill quickly in the freezer and keep the drink chilled for a long time - even on hot days.
customer_reviews.author: A. Kirkbride

customer_reviews.title: Undiluted Drinks!!
customer_reviews.text: This is so cool to get your drink cold for a long time without diluting it.
customer_reviews.author: Eek

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised and worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I have always avoided ice in my drinks because I don't want to water down the drink. These do exactly what I want, which is to chill the drink without watering it down. They are easy to clean, cool in a reasonable amount of time and the handy storage container and tongs work great.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew M.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, heavy
customer_reviews.text: These come packaged in 2 separate boxes. Great quality, heavy, and perfect for any good quality liquor you don't want watered down.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan R

customer_reviews.title: Work great for all beverages
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for use at work to making iced coffee on my k-cup brewer. They work great and stay cold for a long time. Comes with a plastic tray to hold the cubes and makes storage and freezing very simple. Wipe clean with warm water.
customer_reviews.author: KayBee513

customer_reviews.title: You need these if you have the good stuff
customer_reviews.text: If you have the expensive stuff in the liquor carbonate you need these. Who wants to have the good stuff watered down.
customer_reviews.author: Barb in MI

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love the look and the effect of course no diluting my drink!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Not good for large cups
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Barely kept water cold takes forever to chill. Only good for small drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: I love these and bought this set as a gift for ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these and bought this set as a gift for my dad. It comes packaged in a carrier with a set of metal tongs to use on your bar. Nice productive, quick shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Mcdonald

customer_reviews.title: Cool product
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cool product. It keeps are drinks very cool for a long time. It comes in a cute case. I will definitely take this on trips.
customer_reviews.author: LekaC

customer_reviews.title: Nice Idea
customer_reviews.text: They do the job adequately. They have some heft so you do not just drop them into a glass haphazardly and you need to be aware that they are in your glass as you tilt the glass toward your mouth. If you do either of these things aggressively you may end up with a cracked glass or chipped front tooth. They do keep the drink cold without diluting. My experience is that I shake my martini with ice but use these cubes to keep it cold. I am not sure it would chill a drink on its own. If you like your scotch chilled, it might work. I certainly would not want to dilute a quality scotch. Worthwhile.
customer_reviews.author: Dave J

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my brother as part of a gift. I thought the presentation was good and the product was quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Lear

customer_reviews.title: Not Cold Enough
customer_reviews.text: Only sustains the cold for a short time. I was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought this along with those ice ball molds, and ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this along with those ice ball molds, and now I don't use these anymore. The drink may be cold near the whiskey stones if you put all 6 at once, but top of the drink won't be.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Keeps drinks cold
customer_reviews.text: I have several of the traditional soapstone whiskey stones, but I prefer these. They stay colder longer, and are easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: PurelyNicole

customer_reviews.title: A must have for any serious Whiskey or Scotch aficionado
customer_reviews.text: Winner! Winner! These s.s. ice cubes are the thing to have on hand for enjoying any premium liquor. If you've bought or been gifted a bottle of anything top shelf, do yourself &/or your loved one a ravor and buy these bad boys. CHEERS!!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Mayer

customer_reviews.title: Bought these as a gift and they're actually really cool! The case and tongs are also a nice ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift and they're actually really cool! The case and tongs are also a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Interesting product. But I am sure you could chip ...
customer_reviews.text: Interesting product. But I am sure you could chip a tooth with them if you had a few too many LoL. But it does work.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Van Patten

customer_reviews.title: No more watered down drinks
customer_reviews.text: I love these ice cubes. They do not water down my drink at all. They are a perfect gift for any avid whiskey fanatic or your that person in your family that does not enjoy watered down drinks. I use them in all kinds of drinks including soft drinks. If I wanted water, I would drink water!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this kit works great with my Whiskey no more ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this kit works great with my Whiskey no more watered down taste when I use to use ice cubes!
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: They are really nice to look at, and they are a great size. The down size is they don't really cool your drink. Your drink almost has to be cold itself for them to work. If it's not then you'll be lucky if it gets chilled.
customer_reviews.author: Salvador

customer_reviews.title: Chill
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as a gift for someone who enjoys whiskey but doesn't like it to get watered down. He thinks these are great and recommends them to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Perfect as a gift for someone who has the bar at home
customer_reviews.author: Yasmine

customer_reviews.title: Never have water in your drink again
customer_reviews.text: I love that the Stainless Steel Ice Cubes would keep your drink cold, but no more than two drinks
customer_reviews.author: Nelson (lanoche)

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice setup with the tray and tongs. I would feel good giving this as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: C Norris

customer_reviews.title: The cubes chill nicely and are easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: The cubes chill nicely and are easy to clean, but they seem to warm up when put into room temperature scotch very quickly, and the scotch doesn't get that cold.
customer_reviews.author: T.G.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great set of reusable ice cubes. They do work as advertised, perfect size, very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Amy
